Headline: Skill First
ShortDescription:
Igauge is a “talent pre-screening platform" that helps hiring managers and recruiters
 engage, personalize, and shortlist the best candidates globally.
enhanced_description: Igauge is a talent pre-screening platform launched in 2017 that helps hiring managers and recruiters engage, personalize, and shortlist the best candidates globally. The platform emphasizes a 'Skill First' approach, facilitating affordable pre-screening and also functions as background check software. Its primary business objective is to reduce the cost and increase the speed of hiring qualified employees. The platform has served over 75 customers and is growing at an annual rate of 6x.
key_use_cases: Talent pre-screening and shortlisting of candidates
Reducing time-to-hire and overall hiring costs
Assessing candidates based on skills ('Skill First' approach)
competitive_advantages: Global candidate pre-screening and shortlisting capabilities
Focus on skill-based assessment ('Skill First' approach)
roi_benefits: Improved quality of hire through effective pre-screening
